metadata.title: CVE-2021-47159 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: net:dsa: fix a crash if ->get_sset_count() fails If ds->ops->get_sset_count()fails then it "count" is a negative error code such as -EOPNOTSUPP. Because"i" is an unsigned int, the negative error code is type promoted to a veryhigh value and the loop will corrupt memory until the system crashes. Fixthis by checking for error codes and changing the type of "i" to just int.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
